snippet: Professor Current was among the historians who raised the study of Abraham Lincoln to rigorous academic standards.
abstract: Richard N Current, Civil War historian whose award-winning scholarship helped demythologize Abraham Lincoln, dies at age 100.
lead_paragraph: Professor Current was among the historians who raised the study of Abraham Lincoln to rigorous academic standards.

headline.seo: Richard N. Current, Civil War Historian, Dies at 100
headline.main: Richard N. Current, Civil War Historian, Dies at 100
headline.print_headline: Richard N. Current, 100, Dies; Demythologized Lincoln
